block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: OLED SSD1306 - continuosly show the position value of rotary encoder on OLED SSD1306 - reset the position when pressed

40 Note : instead of exactly 40 step per turn, several steps may be missed per turn due to the implementation used. So do not use it to track the absolute position of the knob, just use the position value return by the rotary encoder know the knob have been turn CW or CCW by how much
- continuosly show the position value of rotary encoder - reset the position when pressed
use this block to reset the position of the Rotary Encoder
EC11 - KEY - - when rotary encoder EC11 behave like a push button when pressed - KEY is output of the push button - normally LOW - HIGH when pressed
Status - 40 - - Status will return the current position of the rotary encoder - 40 steps every turn - clockwise (CW) will increase the value - counter-clockwise (CCW) will decrease the value
- S1 S2 need to initialize the rotary encoder - if rotation is wrong direction, just swap the S1 & S2 wiring
EC11 EC11 Rotary Encoder pin connection - GND : GND - S1 : GPIO13 - S2 : GPIO12 - KEY : GPIO14 - 5V : 3.3V or 5V
- espSnap use this to stop checking of rotary encoder rotation - this is only required if the same pin is used for other purpose without power off or reset of espSnap
